document.full_text: more california voters believe public employees' pension benefits are too generous than they did two years ago and a majority support steps to rein in their costs, according to survey results released on thursday.
document.title: california voters souring on public pensions: survey
lines_and_colors: more california voters believe public employees' pension benefits are too generous than they did two years ago and a majority support steps to rein in their costs, according to survey results released on thursday.
